title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document user stories, functional requirements, and non-functional requirements from stakeholders.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the user interface of the platform, considering usability, accessibility, and responsive design.

title: Design AI Models for Translation and Topic Suggestions
description: Develop and train machine learning models to handle real-time translation, topic suggestions, and conversation flow.

title: Develop Backend API
description: Build the backend API for handling user authentication, data storage, and communication between frontend, AI models, and third-party services.
dependencies: Design AI Models for Translation and Topic Suggestions

title: Develop Frontend Application
description: Implement the user interface design using chosen frontend libraries and frameworks, integrating with the backend API.

title: Integrate AI Models into Frontend Application
description: Implement the AI models developed during design phase within the frontend application.
dependencies: Design AI Models for Translation and Topic Suggestions

title: Test the Platform
description: Perform various types of testing including unit tests, integration tests, system tests, and user acceptance tests.
dependencies: Integrate AI Models into Frontend Application

title: Fix and Refine Based on Testing Feedback
description: Address identified issues, improve performance, and ensure platform meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Deploy and Launch the Platform
description: Prepare the platform for production, handle deployment to the chosen infrastructure, and monitor initial performance.
dependencies: Fix and Refine Based on Testing Feedback
